author: jdillon
msg: Adding meta:/system/properties -> SystemPropertiesMetaData which dumps the contents of System.getProperties() via `cat meta:/system/properties`

author: mturk
msg: Add and use retry_interval for load balancer. Like with ajp worker retries and retry_interval are used to create multiple calls to get_worker. On retry the internal tables are reset and everything goes again like with new request

author: jdillon
msg: Allow meta files to contain read-only generated content, to allow files to provide dynamic information similar to the linux /proc fs
